auth.registrationDisabled: Registration is disabled. You can only join this platform by invitation.
auth.invitationInstructions: If you have received an invitation email, please click the link in the email to set up your account.
auth.verificationEmailSent: We've sent you an email with a verification link. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your account.
auth.enterAuthCode: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
auth.resetLinkSent: Password reset link sent to your email
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.passwordSetSuccessfullyDescription: Your password has been successfully set. You will be redirected to the app in a moment.
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
auth.invalidOrExpiredLink: Invalid or expired link. Please request a new invitation or password reset.

questionnaire.title: Questionnaire
questionnaire.notYetAvailableMessage: This questionnaire will be available starting {date}. Please come back after this date to submit your response.
questionnaire.closedMessage: This questionnaire closed on {date}. It is no longer accepting responses.
questionnaire.alreadySubmittedMessage: You submitted a response on {date}. You can update your response below.
questionnaire.question: Question
questionnaire.responseSubmittedSuccess: Your response has been submitted successfully.
questionnaire.responseUpdatedSuccess: Your response has been successfully updated.
questionnaire.notAcceptingResponses: This questionnaire is not currently accepting responses due to time restrictions.

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

errors.contactAdmin: Please contact the organization administrator for a new access link.
errors.failedToSubmit: Failed to submit response. Please try again.
errors.failedToUpdate: Failed to update response. Please try again.

home.heroDescription: Launch your SaaS product in days, not months. Complete with authentication and enterprise-grade security built right in.
home.featureSubtitle: Built with modern technologies and best practices
home.authDescription: Email/password, magic links, OAuth providers, and 2FA support out of the box
home.fileManagementDescription: Built-in file storage with secure sharing, downloads, and granular permissions
home.userSettingsDescription: Complete user management with password updates, MFA setup, and profile controls
home.taskManagementDescription: Built-in todo system with real-time updates and priority management
home.multiTenancyDescription: Organization-based access control with role-based permissions
home.securityDescription: Row-level security, encrypted data, and GDPR compliance built-in
home.legalDescription: Pre-configured privacy policy, terms of service, and refund policy pages
home.cookieDescription: GDPR-compliant cookie consent system with customizable preferences
home.ctaTitle: Ready to Transform Your Idea into Reality?
home.ctaDescription: Join thousands of developers building their SaaS with {productName}

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
